subject: [Radiance-general] UI Boise Graduate student jobs in buildingscience & energy efficiency - UI Boise
body:
Message-ID: <CB7BEF78.1528A%kevinv@uidaho.edu>

All, (pardon cross postings)

The University of Idaho Integrated Design Lab, located in Boise, has been
employing graduate students of architecture and engineering since 2004.
While pursuing masters degrees of architecture or mechanical engineering,
our students engage with professional architects and engineers on funded
research and outreach projects in energy efficiency and building science.
We have a few positions available to graduate students for the 2012-2013
academic year.  Please share this opportunity with excellent students who
are interested in working within a fast-paced and challenging research
laboratory while pursuing a graduate degree.

This link will bring  you to the UI-IDL web page where you can learn more
about our work.  www.uidaho.edu/idl
This link will bring  you to the UI-HR webpage where you can apply.
https://www.sites.uidaho.edu/AppTrack/Agency/Applicant/ViewAnnouncement.asp?
announcement_no=24103037181

Best regards,



Kevin Van Den Wymelenberg
Integrated Design Lab ? Boise, Director
College of Art & Architecture, Assistant Professor
University of Idaho ? Boise Center
www.uidaho.edu/idl

ph. 208.724.9456                    fx. 208.343.0001                    306
S. 6th Street                    Boise, ID  83702
